rows.label: tlk41200151_03_msg0001
rows.name:
From now on, I can live with my
older brother forever!

rows.label: tlk41200151_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Thank you so much for helping
my older brother!

rows.label: tlk41200151_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I was so surprised when
Dad came back.

rows.label: tlk41200151_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I was worried he'd be lazy like before,
but he was completely different.

rows.label: tlk41200151_03_msg0005
rows.name:
He works hard and is kind to us.
I'm sure Mom is happy, too!

rows.label: tlk41200151_03_msg0007
rows.name:
So, I'm going to take Mom's place
and take good care of everyone!

rows.label: tlk41200151_03_msg0008
rows.name: Wait, if I'm Mom, then my older brother is...? Eek!
